sources.title: Geisha Girl (1952) MARTHA HYER
sources.description:
From the producer-director of the half-man half-monster classic, THE MANSTER, comes this long-lost SPY-THRILLER SPOOF.
Directors: George Breakston, C. Ray Stahl
Stars: Martha Hyer, Steve Forrest, Archer MacDonald 

Set during the Korean war, two American GIs head to Tokyo for some well-deserved R&R. Instead they tango with an espionage ring using a Geisha school as a front, and of course, a mad scientist bent on world domination. As an added bonus thereâ€™s my Cinema Guilty pleasure MARTHA HYER before she went BLONDE!

metadata.Plot: "Rocky" Wilson and his sidekick, Archer McGregor, American soldiers en route home from Korea, stop over in Tokyo. They instantly get involved in a sabotage plot and, inadvertently, end up in the possession of some highly-explosive pills. But, with the help of Peggy Barnes, an American airlines hostess, and a crazy magician with hypnotic powers, they put an end to a scheme to take over the world. (Shot entirely in Japan.)
metadata.Director: George P. Breakston, C. Ray Stahl
metadata.Actors: Steve Forrest, Martha Hyer, Archer MacDonald
